actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-459.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 319 - 3 (Record Vote No: 454).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4196) to stabilize a temporary imbalance in the supply and demand for dairy products, and to enable milk producers to establish, finance, and carry out a coordinated program of dairy product promotion to improve, maintain, and develop markets for dairy products.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 4196 (dairy products).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 4196) to stabilize a temporary imbalance in the supply and demand for dairy products, and to enable milk producers to establish, finance, and carry out a coordinated program of dairy product promotion to improve, maintain, and develop markets for dairy products.
